required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of SC10914 in Patients With gBRCA1/2 Mutation Advanced Ovarian Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: SC10914 Monotherapy for gBRCA1/2 Mutation Advanced Ovarian Cancer Patients With at Least 2 Prior Lines of Chemotherapy: a Single Arm, Open Label, Multicenter Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: A phase II, multicenter, open-label, single-arm study to evaluate the efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics of SC10914 in subjects with gBRCA1/2 mutated advanced ovarian cancer in china.

detailed_description.textblock:
A total of 104 subjects with gBRCA1/2 mutated advanced ovarian cancer is planned to be enrolled to observe the efficacy, safety and PK profile of SC10914.
The subjects oral administration SC10914 tablets 400mg on an empty stomach, three times a day, for 28 consecutive days as a treatment cycle, until disease progression (PD) or the toxicity was intolerable. PK blood samples are planned to be collected for each enrolled subject on C1D28 visit.

primary_outcome.description: assessed by the independent imaging assessment committee (recist1.1)

intervention.description: 400mg TID, oral admination on fasting condition
